title: Weekend Wrap: Goodbye Urán, Hello Rookie Sensation Luke Lamperti
content:
Tour de Hoody: Cycling's 'Mick Jagger' exits cycling stage left, Kopecky's on fire, and American fans might finally have the sprinter star they've been waiting for.

Read the full article at Weekend Wrap: Goodbye Urán, Hello Rookie Sensation Luke Lamperti on Velo.
author: ahood
